alert.note: Alert for Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 29 at 10:03PM PST until December 31 at 4:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM FRIDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow occurring. Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Snow accumulations of 12 to 24 inches above 6000 to 6500 feet and 2 to 4 feet above 7500 feet. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains and Riverside County Mountains above 5000 feet today, above 5500 feet overnight, and above 6000 feet Thursday morning * WHEN...Until 4 AM Friday. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Be prepared for significant reductions in visibility at times. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are occurring. If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For road condition information in California...enter 8 0 0 4 2 7 7 6 2 3 if inside california or 9 1 6 4 5 5 7 6 2 3 if outside California.

area.areaDesc: Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains
